editor.label: Application Server - IIS6 DeleteWebSite
editor.description: This procedure deletes a web site.

formElement.label: Configuration name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the name of the configuration that holds connection information for the IIS server.

formElement.label: Absolute path of the script utility:
formElement.documentation: Provide the absolute path of the script utility used to execute this step (for example: iisweb or c:/windows/system32/iisweb.vbs).

formElement.label: Web site name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the descriptive name, or the metabase path, of the web site you want to delete.
